title: VBA-Based Fractional Expression Proficiency Improvement Project

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic mathematical concepts, proficiency in Excel interface fundamentals
context.additional_context: Course for elementary education majors and pre-service teachers, emphasizing development of digital teaching tool competencies applicable to real classrooms

learning_goals: Can develop a visualization tool for arithmetic operations with fractions using VBA (Visual Basic for Applications)
Can accurately represent fraction concepts (numerator/denominator, equivalent fractions, simplification) at over 85% accuracy through digital learning media
Can deliver a 15+ minute oral presentation and conduct peer evaluations on the mathematical expression process of fractions based on project outcomes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
